channel.title: Drop items pickup
channel.description:
Alright I am using Pimpscape base. Say multiple items have been dropped on the ground and they stack up. If you you pick up one of those several items it'll delete all the other items under it..
say there were a few sharks on the ground, about 5 you pickup 1 shark and all the sharks delete from the ground??
Does anyone know how to fix this?? pickup void?

item.title: Drop items pickup
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

Alright I am using Pimpscape base.
Say multiple items have been dropped on the ground and they stack up.
If you you pick up one of those several items it’ll delete all the other items under it…

say there were a few sharks on the ground, about 5
you pickup 1 shark and all the sharks delete from the ground??

Does anyone know how to fix this??
pickup void?
